3rdparty additions are welcome
------------------------------
anything from simple code snippets to modules to full-fledged extensions

please add a readme containing:
-------------------------------
1. how to install
2. how to use
3. ownership

ownership means:
you reply to questions, you maintain, you improve.
a 3rdparty addition without ownership is basically unmanaged

to upload
------------------------------------------------------
please use simplegroupwarelab@gmail.com or join github
